Docs.summary: Provides facilities for managing input languages in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)].

remarks.format:
## Remarks Additional languages can be registered by using the Regional and Language Options control panel. From the Languages tab, select "Text Services and input languages", then click the "Details" button to register additional languages. The following dialog appears.
![Text services and input languages dialog.](../../add/media/tsf-dialog.PNG "Text services and input languages dialog.")
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to use an InputLanguageManager to set the input language of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> element.
